resources.string: Hello Guys! Welcome to the all new Splitster App! Be it any college trip, family outing, or simply hanging out with friends over a cup of coffee, bill-splitting has always been a pain in the bum. So, presenting to you, this application, specially developed to come to your rescue.
Adds a valid entry with a valid \"Name\" Field and a valid \"Amount Paid\" Field. Press this when you are done filling up a proper entry.

string.name: add2
string.i: Note: Once an entry has been added to the list, it can\'t be further edited. It can be deleted though.

resources.string: Views the final amount to be \"given by\" or to be \"taken from\" the entry list. Press this when you are done adding all the entries
Refreshes the list and all the present data. Press this only when you want to make a New List
Deletes a valid entry with a valid \"Name\" Field and a valid \"Amount Paid\" Field. Press this when you are done writing a proper entry
Logs Out of current user account. \nNote: All current data will be deleted
Exits from the application. \nNote: All current data will be deleted
